name: Jewel Quest 4 Heritage
description:
Hit the trail with Rupert on a journey
through the shrines and castles of
Hernan Cortes's lore. Swap jewels
and collect puzzle pieces to unravel a
perplexing web of family history. With
over 170 new Jewel Boards, including
three jewel-swapping modes, new
surprises await in every level.
